definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: It starts with finding a place to sit on the plane.
sentences.chinese: 一切的悲剧发端于在飞机上找个地儿坐。

sentences.english: It's like a place where penguins could nest or lay their eggs.
sentences.chinese: 像企鹅筑巢下蛋的地儿。

sentences.english: I'm not going anywhere. I sigh...
sentences.chinese: 我不准备去别的地儿了。

sentences.english: It tastes like something you’d buy from Hickory Farms or something.
sentences.chinese: 味道象从“希可利农家菜”或什么地儿买回来的东西。

sentences.english: This table takes up too much room.

definition: side/edge/margin/border/boundary/proximity/thread (of ideas, plots etc)/see also 邊|边[bian1]
erhua variant of 飯館|饭馆[fan4 guan3]
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
erhua variant of 旮旯[ga1 la2]
erhua variant of 東邊|东边[dong1 bian5]
rickshaw seat (Beijing dialect)/patron (of teahouse, cinema)/passenger (in taxi, rickshaw etc)
erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]
